about_the_game:
Jasper's Island is a 2D-platformer where you play as a cat and lighthouse keeper. Both have different abilities to negotiate obstacles encountered when exploring the island's caves, forests and shipwrecks.



This hand drawn island is full of secrets and the story is told though symbols that can be enjoyed by anyone. You'll water the garden, repair the lighthouse, and investigate the mysterious spores.

Key Features:

  • Beautiful painted environments with hand crafted lighting from morning to night
  • Creatures and characters animated with traditional frame-by-frame drawings
  • Explore the mysterious island at your own pace
  • Collect all the secrets through multiple playthroughs
  • A short game (about 2-3 hours) involving light puzzles and platforming elements
  • No AI tools or AI-generated art used in the production
